{{Description|Fireworks are man-made starlight, comets fired into the sky. Though they last for but an instant, the memory of their brilliance shall surely live on.}}
'''Ryuukin Saxifrage''' is [[Yoimiya]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* In [[Co-Op Mode]], the Aurous Blaze explosion can also be triggered by attacks from other players.
* The Aurous Blaze can be triggered by off-field abilities like [[Beidou]]'s [[Stormbreaker]] and [[Xingqiu]]'s [[Guhua Sword: Raincutter]], even if Yoimiya is the active character.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|ascension|2|Summer Night's Dawn|Grants a 10% to 20% ATK buff to nearby party members for 15s upon using Ryuukin Saxifrage, based on [[Tricks of the Trouble-Maker]] stacks.|character=Yoimiya|talent=Ryuukin Saxifrage}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>

==Trivia==
* The "Ryuukin" {{Lang|ja=琉金}} in Ryuukin Saxifrage {{Lang|ja=琉金の雲間草|ja_rm=Ryuukin no Kumomagusa}} refers to the {{w|Ryukin}} goldfish, which is a recurring motif in Yoimiya's design. It is also [[Carassius Auratus#Other Languages|her Constellation's]] name in East Asian languages.
* The species of saxifrage denoted by the Japanese name {{ja|雲間草|rm=kumomagusa}} is {{w|ja:クモマグサ|''Saxifraga merkii'' var. ''idsuroei''}}, colloquially known as {{lang|"winter's fireworks"|ja=冬の花火|ja_rm=fuyu no hanabi}} in Japan.
* {{Talent Note|clap}}
* The Aurous Blaze [[status|mark]] applied to the enemy spins clockwise.
